text:
Workflow field for custom modules is being sunset.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/workflow-field-for-custom-modules-is-being-sunset>

This field was designed to allow developers to set a value ofÂ `form_follow_ups_workflow_id`in the form HubL tag. When used in a custom module this way, contacts are not being enrolled in the set workflow. To prevent this issue affecting future forms, the field will no longer be available to add.
